h3.span: As the center of a small, uniquely engaged community, The School District of Jenkintown is committed to providing a safe and nurturing environment with diverse, challenging learning opportunities for all students to acquire the motivation, knowledge and skills to achieve academic excellence while competing in and contributing to a rapidly changing global society.

div.class: av_promobox avia-button-yes avia-builder-el-17 el_after_av_section el_before_av_section avia-builder-el-no-sibling

div.h1: Be a vital part of Jenkintown History. Make a gift today!

div.class: avia-section main_color avia-section-default avia-no-shadow avia-bg-style-scroll avia-builder-el-18 el_after_av_promobox avia-builder-el-last container_wrap fullsize

h5.span: The School District of Jenkintown is committed to ensuring that all material on its website is accessible to students, faculty, staff and the general public. If you experience difficulty with the accessibility of any web pages or documents, please contact Mr. Cummins at 215-885-3722 to request our materials in an alternate format.

div.p:
325 Highland Avenue (GPS 285 West Avenue)
Jenkintown PA, 19046
(215) 885-3722
